title.rendered: Eldorado Stone® Introduces Rugged And Handsome Stone Veneer In Two New Striking Colors

content.rendered:
The nationally available Mountain Ledge Panel profile emulates hand-laid and dry-stacked stone and is currently available in a number of attractive tones and hues. The newest color, Whiskey Creek, adds a deeper and bolder color palette to the already popular Mountain Ledge Panel color offerings. With its deep charcoal tones and hints of burgundy, oak and rust, this new color is perfect for dark accents and offers a more rustic and masculine design option.

The popular and modern LedgeCut33™ is named for its three-inch-high stones patterned in three lengths, which create a variable design that is visually appealing and naturally artistic. The new Golden Oak color features desert hues with touches of gold and apricot highlights—making this unique color an excellent option for contemporary designs and more.

“We pride ourselves in expanding color palettes with additions that we are confident will be in-demand,” says Eldorado Stone Vice President of Marketing Brent Spann. “We are excited to add Whiskey Creek to the Mountain Ledge Panel profile and Golden Oak to the LedgeCut33 profile and look forward to seeing how architects, designers and homeowners will be inspired to integrate them into their projects.”
